name: Jack Of All
description:
Overview

Jack-Of-All uses a Trait System where the player will choose only 2 out of 5 possible traits to solve the various environment puzzles and complete the game.

As the game progresses, the player will not be able to change traits and must come up with creative ways of using the traits to overcome the obstacles.

Traits:
  • Thrust - Jack thrusts forward, pushing or destroying objects and damaging enemies
  • Yeet - telekinetically move objects forward or backward
  • Levitate - Jack can vertically levitate and hold one obstacle or enemy at a time
  • Plank - Draw and Summon a large wooden plank
  • Grapple - attach a rope to any obstacle in the Map and jack will pull himself towards it
MAGES Institute of Excellence

Jack Of All was developed over a 2.5 month period by a team of 3 full-time developers as part of the Production Module.

Credits

This game was made by:

  • John David Uy -Producer
  • Noire Chai - Leader/Level Design
  • Ian Ngoh - Lead Programmer/Sound Designer/UI Design
  • Nilson Tan - Assistant Programmer/UI Design
Asset Credits:
